mapper.insert: insert into music(music_code, title, lyrics, mp3_path, img_path, genre_code, release_date, file_size, runtime, id, views) VALUES ((select nextval('MUSIC_CODE_SEQ') FROM dual), #{title}, #{lyrics}, #{mp3Path}, #{imgPath}, #{genreCode}, #{releaseDate}, #{fileSize}, #{runtime}, #{artist}, #{views})
mapper.select: select music_code musicCode, title, lyrics, release_date releaseDate, mp3_path mp3Path, img_path imgPath, file_size fileSize, runtime, views, genre_code genreCode, id artist from music

select review_id reviewId, review_contents reviewContents, review_depth reviewDepth, review_regdate reviewRegdate, review_like reviewLike, parent_id parentId, id, music_code musicCode from review where music_code = #{music_code} order by review_regdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into review(review_id, review_contents, review_depth, review_regdate, review_like, parent_id, id, music_code) values((select nextval('REVIEW_ID_SEQ') from dual), #{reviewContents}, 0, default, 0, null, #{id}, #{musicCode})
mapper.select: select music_code musicCode, title, lyrics, release_date releaseDate, mp3_path mp3Path, img_path imgPath, file_size fileSize, runtime, views, genre_code genreCode, id artist from music order by release_date desc

SELECT m.music_code musicCode, m.title, m.lyrics, m.release_date releaseDate, m.mp3_path mp3Path, m.img_path imgPath, m.file_size fileSize, m.runtime, m.views, m.genre_code genreCode, m.id artist FROM music m JOIN playlist_music pm ON m.music_code = pm.music_code JOIN playlist p ON pm.playlist_code = p.playlist_code WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where music_code = #{musicCode} and id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from favorite where music_code = #{musicCode} and id = #{id}

SELECT music_code musicCode, title, lyrics, release_date releaseDate, mp3_path mp3Path, img_path imgPath, file_size fileSize, runtime, views, genre_code genreCode, id artist FROM music ORDER BY
title ASC release_date DESC views DESC likes DESC title
